name: Giovanni Magnaghi
subtitle: CEO Zambon Spa
about: International experienced Executive with an extensive background in Finance matured in multinational companies. Now leading Zambon organisation to continue an 118 years success story and bringing new therapeutic options to patients
experiences: Leading Finance function in EMEA and business partner to SVP EMEA Commercial.

Senior Regional Finance Director, reporting to VP Finance EMEA and Business Partner to Region VP. Managing a team of 40+ people and responsible for finance activities in 15 entities across EMEA Region. Different interim roles covered in addition: General Manager Italy (May-Sep '14), Finance Director Spain (Dec '14 - Aug '15), General Manager Turkey (Sep '15- Apr '16)

In addition to RFD role  I have covered on an interim basis the General Manager role in the Turkish affiliate. Leadership Team reorganization, Pricing and Reimbursement negotiation, leading the organization through a transition period and strenghtening company culture while delivering continuous business growth.

Director of Finance - IT - Logistics. Managing a team of 70+ people to provide full oversight of all financial activities in Italy (Financial reporting US Gaap and Statutory - Tax - Credit Management - Financial Planning and Business Support) and coordinate IT and Logistics team.

Finance Business Partner Vision Care EMEA and Regional Controller Italy and Spain. This Director position combines the Business Support role for EMEA region with the Controlling role of two specific countries (Italy and Spain). Managing a team of 32 people to provide excellent financial control and strategic business advice.
FP&A responsibilities (Forecast and Planning, Business Ananlysis and Support) for the EMEA region
Finance Responsibilities over Italy, Greece and Special Projects for EMEA region - B&L Project Manager for the set up of EMEA outsourced Finance Shared Service Center
Financial Planning for Grooming Division and Legal Entity

Z-LIFE, nome scelto dai collaboratori Zambon ha richiesto 426 giorni di lavoro e impiegato 3.000 metri quadrati di vetro, 250mila chili di acciaio, 70 km di cavi elettrici. Rispetta i più moderni criteri di sostenibilità e prevede soluzioni tecnologicamente avanzate grazie alla gestione tramite BMS (Building Management System), un sistema che permette di monitorare e gestire tramite sensori la climatizzazione, le luci e la sicurezza dello spazio.Progetto Architettonico a cura di Michele De LucchiInterior Design a cura di Carlo RattiCredits Photos Luca Rotondo

Zambon entered in an exclusive license agreement with Aquestive Therapeutics to register and commercialize riluzole Oral Film in Europe for patients with ALS (amyotrophic lateral sclerosis).“We are proud to announce that Zambon will register and commercialize in Europe riluzole Oral Film. Thanks to this partnership with Aquestive, Zambon will further strengthen its commitment to orphan diseases and to the CNS area, enriching its portfolio with a new formulation that will concretely help ALS patients. Zambon is committed to improve people’s quality of life through innovative medicines and modern therapeutic solutions where they are mostly needed,” Roberto Tascione, CEO of Zambon S.p.A.
